text: I was transferred to Singapore since last two months.. was in new place for the first time in my life is so stressful. I am glad I met Vikas. He help me a lot with his great meditation methods. I feel a lot better now, and sure I will recommend them for everyone.
Meditation has made me calmer and I feel a sense of lightness. Vikas has a unique way of teaching meditation. I am lucky to have such a teacher.
